name: Hiveswap Friendsim: Volume Ten
summary: Back at it again at Hiveswap Friendsim—here, at the auspicious tenth volume. Wow. Ten whole volumes. That’s over TWENTY WHOLE FRIENDS! You can feel the sparkle of your success stories billowing in your wake, leaving a trail of stardust wherever you go. Seems like this might be a good time to sit back, relax, coast a little bit.
